itemDisplayName: Create a VM from a custom VHD, deploys into an existing Availability Set and connects it to an existing VNET
description: This template creates a VM from a specialized VHD, deploys into an existing Availability Set and lets you connect it to an existing VNET that can reside in another Resource Group then the virtual machine. This template is useful if you have a VM that you want to re-deploy into an Availability Set.
summary: Create a VM from a specialized VHD and connect it to an existing virtual network
